title: SplatfestDL
author: Sheldon10095
details:
Custom Splatfest Downloader for Splatoon.

This app has an auto-update feature.

Download Custom Splatfests for Splatoon!

For more info, join the Custom Splatfest Discord Server.

Run MochaCFW SD before running this, and also, PLEASE backup your save file just in case.
changelog:
0.3

Fixed another SSL error

0.2

Built with Curl 7.75.0, and fixes SSL errors. (Specifically CURLE_SSL_CONNECT_ERROR )

0.1

Initial Release.
